languages.text: "Частота вывода еретики-сообщений достигла пика в момент первичной фазы экзорцизма. Одновременно с этим упомянутые мною младшие технопослушники совершили акт самовольного саморасчленения. Однако с ходом ритуалов частотность сообщений снизилась и наконец сошла на нет. И вместе с ней — акты скверно-проявлений".

traits.locale_text: "Частота вывода еретики-сообщений достигла пика в момент первичной фазы экзорцизма. Одновременно с этим упомянутые мною младшие технопослушники совершили акт самовольного саморасчленения. Однако с ходом ритуалов частотность сообщений снизилась и наконец сошла на нет. И вместе с ней — акты скверно-проявлений".
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: "The frequency of heretici-messages reached its peak during the initial phase of the techsorcism rite. Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."
languages.original_text: "Частота вывода еретики-сообщений достигла пика в момент первичной фазы экзорцизма. Одновременно с этим упомянутые мною младшие технопослушники совершили акт самовольного саморасчленения. Однако с ходом ритуалов частотность сообщений снизилась и наконец сошла на нет. И вместе с ней — акты скверно-проявлений".

Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: 「異端メッセージの頻度は、技術払いの儀式の最初のフェーズでピークに達しました。同時に、私が報告で先ほど申し上げました下級テック・アコライトが独断で自身の手足切断を行いました。しかし儀式が進むにつれ、これらの事象の頻度は下がり、最終的にはメッセージも表示されなくなりました。汚染現象についても同様です」
languages.original_text: "The frequency of heretici-messages reached its peak during the initial phase of the techsorcism rite. Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."

traits.locale_text: 「異端メッセージの頻度は、技術払いの儀式の最初のフェーズでピークに達しました。同時に、私が報告で先ほど申し上げました下級テック・アコライトが独断で自身の手足切断を行いました。しかし儀式が進むにつれ、これらの事象の頻度は下がり、最終的にはメッセージも表示されなくなりました。汚染現象についても同様です」
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: “在技术仪式的起始阶段，异端信息的频率达到了顶峰。与此同时，我在报告前面提到的那些年轻技工进行了无端的自我肢解行为。然而，随着仪式的继续，这些事件的频率也逐渐下降，最终，异端信息彻底消失，污染现象也不再发生。”
languages.original_text: "The frequency of heretici-messages reached its peak during the initial phase of the techsorcism rite. Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."

traits.locale_text: “在技术仪式的起始阶段，异端信息的频率达到了顶峰。与此同时，我在报告前面提到的那些年轻技工进行了无端的自我肢解行为。然而，随着仪式的继续，这些事件的频率也逐渐下降，最终，异端信息彻底消失，污染现象也不再发生。”
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: "Die Häufigkeit der Häretik-Nachrichten erreichte ihren Höhepunkt während der Anfangsphase des Techsorzismus-Ritus. Zur gleichen Zeit haben die eingangs erwähnten niederen Tech-Akolythen willkürliche Selbstverstümmelungshandlungen vorgenommen. Im weiteren Verlauf der Rituale hat die Häufigkeit dieser Ereignisse jedoch abgenommen, schließlich wurden gar keine Nachrichten mehr angezeigt. Auch die Makel-Phänomene treten nicht mehr auf."
languages.original_text: "The frequency of heretici-messages reached its peak during the initial phase of the techsorcism rite. Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."

traits.locale_text: "Die Häufigkeit der Häretik-Nachrichten erreichte ihren Höhepunkt während der Anfangsphase des Techsorzismus-Ritus. Zur gleichen Zeit haben die eingangs erwähnten niederen Tech-Akolythen willkürliche Selbstverstümmelungshandlungen vorgenommen. Im weiteren Verlauf der Rituale hat die Häufigkeit dieser Ereignisse jedoch abgenommen, schließlich wurden gar keine Nachrichten mehr angezeigt. Auch die Makel-Phänomene treten nicht mehr auf."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: « La fréquence des messages hérétiques a atteint son maximum pendant la phase initiale du rite de techxorcisme. Parallèlement, les jeunes techno-acolytes que j'ai mentionnés précédemment se sont livrés à des actes d'autodémembrement arbitraires. Toutefois, la fréquence de ces événements a décliné à mesure que les rituels se poursuivaient et les messages ont cessé de s'afficher. Les phénomènes d'altération ont également arrêté de se produire. »
languages.original_text: "The frequency of heretici-messages reached its peak during the initial phase of the techsorcism rite. Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."

traits.locale_text: « La fréquence des messages hérétiques a atteint son maximum pendant la phase initiale du rite de techsorcisme. Parallèlement, les jeunes techno-acolytes que j'ai mentionnés précédemment se sont livrés à des actes d'autodémembrement arbitraires. Toutefois, la fréquence de ces événements a décliné à mesure que les rituels se poursuivaient et les messages ont cessé de s'afficher. Les phénomènes d'altération ont également arrêté de se produire. »
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: «La frecuencia de estos mensajes heréticos alcanzó su apogeo durante la fase inicial del ritual de tecnoexorcismo. Al mismo tiempo, los tecnoacólitos que mencioné antes en mi informe cometieron actos de automutilación arbitraria. Sin embargo, a medida que continuaron los rituales, la frecuencia de estos sucesos disminuyó hasta que finalmente los mensajes dejaron de aparecer. Los fenómenos corruptos también han cesado».
languages.original_text: "The frequency of heretici-messages reached its peak during the initial phase of the techsorcism rite. Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."

traits.locale_text: «La frecuencia de estos mensajes heréticos alcanzó su apogeo durante la fase inicial del ritual de tecnoexorcismo. Al mismo tiempo, los tecnoacólitos que mencioné antes en mi informe cometieron actos de automutilación arbitraria. Sin embargo, a medida que continuaron los rituales, la frecuencia de estos sucesos disminuyó hasta que finalmente los mensajes dejaron de aparecer. Los fenómenos corruptos también han cesado».
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: "Zındık mesajların frekansı, teknokovuç ayininin başında zirveye ulaştı. Raporda bahsettiğim ast tekno havariler ise bu fenomenle eş zamanlı olarak, gayriihtiyari biçimde kendilerini parçalama eyleminde bulundular. Her nasılsa ayin devam etti. Önce bu olayların sıklığı azaldı, sonra da mesajlar görünmeyi bıraktı. Kusur fenomeni de aynı şekilde kayboldu gitti."
languages.original_text: "The frequency of heretici-messages reached its peak during the initial phase of the techsorcism rite. Concurrently, the junior tech-acolytes I mentioned earlier in the report performed acts of arbitrary self-dismemberment. However, as the rituals continued, the frequency of these events declined and eventually the messages stopped displaying altogether. The taint-phenomena have likewise ceased to occur."

traits.locale_text: "Zındık mesajların frekansı, teknokovuç ayininin başlangıcında zirveye ulaştı. Raporda bahsettiğim ast tekno havariler isee bu fenomenle eş zamanlı olarak, gayriihtiyari biçimde, kendilerini parçalama eyleminde bulundular. Her nasılsa ayin devam etti ve önce bu olayların sıklığı azaldı, sonra da mesajlar görünmeyi bıraktı. Kusur fenomeni de aynı şekilde yok oldu."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster
